Interpol steže obruč oko Georgine, ali ona i Carver ne odustaju od nauma da istragu privedu kraju. Irina Negrescuu odaje obiteljsku tajnu...
Uloge: Anthony LaPaglia (Constantine Clios), Julia Stiles (Georgina Marjorie Clios), Adrian Lester (Robert Carver), Lena Olin (Irina Atman), Iwan Rheon (Adam Clios), Dimitri Leonidas (Christos Clios), Roxane Duran (Adriana Clios), Igal Naor (Jakob Negrescu), Phil Davis (Jukes) Autor: Neil Jordan Izvršni producenti: Neil Jordan, Liza Marshall, Kris Thykier, Paul McGuinness Producent: Foz Allan Scenaristi: John Banville, Lydia Adetunji, Chris Smith, Stacey Gregg, Guy Burt Redatelji: Philipp Kadelbach, Damon Thomas Urednik: Saša Runjić
